    • Method Detail

      • getCommand

        public static edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket getCommand(CommandType type,
                                                                      edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry querier,
                                                                      Object... keysAndValues)
                                                               throws ClientException
        Constructs a command of type type issued by the querier using the variable length array keysAndValues. If querier is non-null, the returned command will be signed by the querier's private key. If querier is null, the command will succeed only if the operation is open to all, which is normally true only for fields that are readable by anyone.
        Parameters:
        type -
        querier - The GUID issuing this query.
        keysAndValues - A variable length array of even size containing a sequence of key and value pairs.
        Returns:
        A CommandPacket constructed using the supplied arguments.
        Throws:
        ClientException

      • aclAdd

        public static final edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket aclAdd(AclAccessType accessType,
                                                                        edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry targetGUID,
                                                                        String field,
                                                                        String accesserGUID)
                                                                 throws ClientException
        Adds accessorGUID to the access control list (ACL) of targetGUID:field. accessorGUID can be a GUID of a user or a group GUID or null that means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means the accessorGUID is being added to the ACLs of all fields of targetGUID.
        Parameters:
        accessType - a value from GnrsProtocol.AclAccessType
        targetGUID - The GUID being queried (updated).
        field - The field key.
        accesserGUID - GUID to add to the ACL
        Returns:
        CommandPacket
        Throws:
        ClientException - if the query is not accepted by the server.

      • selectQuery

        public static final edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket selectQuery(String query)
                                                                      throws ClientException
        Selects all GUID records that match query. The result type of the execution result of this query is GNSCommand.ResultType.LIST. The query syntax is described here: https://gns.name/wiki/index.php?title=Query_Syntax There are some predefined field names such as GNSCommandProtocol.LOCATION_FIELD_NAME and GNSCommandProtocol.IPADDRESS_FIELD_NAME that are indexed by default. There are links in the wiki page above to find the exact syntax for querying spatial coordinates.
        Parameters:
        query - The select query being issued.
        Returns:
        CommandPacket
        Throws:
        ClientException

      • selectSetupGroupQuery

        public static final edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket selectSetupGroupQuery(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry accountGUID,
                                                                                       String publicKey,
                                                                                       String query,
                                                                                       int interval)
                                                                                throws ClientException
        Set up a context-aware group GUID corresponding to the query. Requires accountGuid and publicKey that are used to set up the new GUID or look it up if it already exists. The result type of the execution result of this query is GNSCommand.ResultType.LIST. The query syntax is described here: https://gns.name/wiki/index.php?title=Query_Syntax
        Parameters:
        accountGUID - The GUID issuing the query.
        publicKey -
        query - The select query.
        interval - The refresh interval in seconds (default 60).
        Returns:
        CommandPacket
        Throws:
        ClientException

        Looks up the membership of a context-aware group GUID created using a query. The results may be stale if the queries that happen more quickly than the refresh interval given during setup. The result type of the execution result of this query is GNSCommand.ResultType.LIST.
        Parameters:
        groupGUID - The group GUID being queried.

        CommandPacket
        Throws:

      • selectWithin

        public static final edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket selectWithin(String field,
                                                                              JSONArray value)
                                                                       throws Exception
        If field is a GeoSpatial field, the query searches for all GUIDs that have fields that are within the bounding box specified by value as nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]. The result type of the execution result of this query is GNSCommand.ResultType.LIST.
        Parameters:
        field - The field key.
        value - - [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
        Returns:
        CommandPacket
        Throws:
        Exception

      • selectNear

        public static final edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket selectNear(String field,
                                                                            JSONArray value,
                                                                            Double maxDistance)
                                                                     throws ClientException
        If field is a GeoSpatial field, the query searches for all GUIDs whose field is near value that is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT]. maxDistance is in meters.
        Parameters:
        field - The field key
        value - - [LONG, LAT]
        maxDistance - - distance in meters
        Returns:
        CommandPacket
        Throws:
        ClientException
